name: Dragon's Airship v0.1
description:
Version 0.1

So far the only objective is to find the winged key!  (which is only the goal on some levels)  A lot more gameplay elements are planned. 

Controls: WASD to move, space to jump, mouse to look around, E to talk to people.

This is an early alpha build of my PC game.  Most of the coding I got from youtube tutorials by gamesplusjames and thesenpaicode.

art by me and Kylfthean

3D models by me

music by me and Luka

free skybox from G. E. Team
